Name: Lux
Text: What are Toaster bots doing down here? I saw one earlier too. They are... or were dungeon's first line of defense, but this dungeon is very old so they should no longer be active.

Name: Lux
Text: Toaster bots are fast and have impressive range. But their high energy weapons take some time to recover after each shot. Anytime you need to recheck your enemies visit the Records in the pause menu, hit [ESC].
